about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hello, I’m <1>Raúl García Muñoz</1>, a Full Stack developer specialized in web and cross-platform applications. I’m passionate about creating functional and efficient solutions that provide a smooth user experience.
about.paragraph2: I have also explored game development with <1>Unity</1> through an intensive course, which allowed me to broaden my perspective in programming and interactive system design.

moneyMinder.title: Money Minder
moneyMinder.description: Final project of the Multiplatform Applications Development degree: a banking-style app that manages and tracks the user's different incomes and expenses.

undeadHunt.title: Undead Hunt
undeadHunt.description: End-of-course Game Development project: a third-person PVE shooter game based on the zombies mode of the famous Call of Duty franchise.

myPetsHealthHub.title: My Pet's Health Hub
myPetsHealthHub.description: Final project of Web Applications Development: a platform that manages pets, veterinarians, and other functionalities and services related to pets.

echoPlay.title: EchoPlay
echoPlay.description: Personal music streaming project similar to Spotify: allows creating playlists, playing songs, and managing music interactively.

title: Contact
description: You can get in touch with me through the following channels:
subtitle: Built with React

moneyMinderPage.title: Money Minder
moneyMinderPage.description: Money Minder is the final project of the Multiplatform Application Development degree, designed to facilitate personal financial management. The application allows users to register their income and expenses and classify them by categories to track their finances. It also includes various charts to make it easier and more visual to see the user's financial trajectory.

description.part1: is a video game developed as the final project for the Video Game Development and Virtual Reality course. Inspired by the zombies mode of the
description.part2: saga, this title combines intense action with a dark and challenging atmosphere.
description.part3: The player must survive endless waves of enemies, improving their skills and strategies each round. Developed with
description.part4: and C#, the game integrates AI systems, wave generation, scoring, and Asset Store levels, along with cinematic finishing using manually edited videos. Below you can see the game trailer, its documentation, the project, and the compiled version.

description.part1: My Pet’s Health Hub is a platform designed to facilitate the care and management of pets' health. Owners can register information about their animals, save medical histories, track vaccinations, medications, and upcoming vet visits.
description.part2: Veterinarians can also easily access each pet's data, schedule appointments, review records, and keep everything organized in one place.

video.fallback: Your browser does not support video playback.

columns.title: Web
columns.description: The main website where users can manage all their pets' information comfortably and visually from a browser.

columns.title: Application
columns.description: Mobile and web version of the platform, designed for access via phone or browser, with a simple and fast experience for owners and vets.

columns.title: Server
columns.description: This system connects the web and mobile versions, managing data and ensuring the security of each user and pet's information.

description.part1: Echo Play is an application ecosystem designed for music management and playback within a local network. It consists of a central server and three client applications that communicate with it.
description.part2: Thanks to this modular structure, each component has a specific role, ensuring efficient communication and a smooth experience on both desktop and mobile devices.

columns.title: Kotlin App
columns.description: Android application developed in Kotlin acting as the main player, connecting to the server to stream available songs.

columns.title: Echo Play Upload
columns.description: Desktop application in C# that allows uploading songs and covers to the server from a local machine, keeping the music library updated and organized.

columns.title: Echo Play Manager
columns.description: Administrative application in C# for managing the server, users, and playlists, providing full control over the music environment.

columns.title: Server
columns.description: Server developed in Express that hosts audio tracks, covers, images, APKs and exposes the necessary REST endpoints for playback and file management. Accessible from any device with Internet connection.
